channel.title: We, the community
channel.description:
We, the Moparscape Community,(supporters of TinyScape specifically...) Do hearby make an appeal for a one mentioned former member and now banned member of the Moparscape forums "TinyScape" to be lifted of all charges against him. We, the community as a whole speak as one to announce that the ban to be lifted and support the lifting of the ban. We, the community, strive to support each other in all of our shortcomings and mistakes. The below is a list of usernames of those who openly wish to support the removal of Tinyscape's ban.
he way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime [center]-Babe Ruth[/center]
[b]Supporters:[/b] - Comments 1. LOVEANDPOWER - Above comment 2. imsuperman05 - support 3. Galennn - support 4. Bells - Support 5. chillwitm888 [size=6pt]Support, Do it or else we won't use Public Transportations ever again!![/size] 6. Ix Soulcist xI - Support 7. youridudock - Support! 8. arham 4 - Support 9. blessedabyss - Support 10. Dunder Mifflin - I support! 11. Wet Dreams - gave good explanation

item.title: We, the community
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This was open longer than it should have been. The fundamental questions I wanted answered have been answered. Hopefully you understand our decisions a bit better, so there really is no need for topics like this anymore.

My purpose was not to target this particular instance at all. To be honest, I thought the majority of this topic was an attention cry. It doesn’t matter though. The purpose behind it has been resolved and we are expecting to see no more topics asking for people to be unbanned.

Read full topic

item.title: We, the community
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well this went downhill pretty damn fast

As there is no further discussion about the subject going on, I think it’s a fair time to lock it now. I’d infract the spammers, but as Taharok was the one that gave the warning, and there are a ton of open reports at the moment…

Read full topic

item.title: We, the community
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:181, topic:428599”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=531288.msg3883404#msg3883404 date=1326237219]

If you look at the formal grammar here it is talking about members of moparscape who support this not the ENTIRE moparscape community…

No, you were not. Not once in your post did you state that it was only the members who support your stupid petition. You are only going down hill from here, you’d be wiser to give in.
[/quote]I edited so people would stfu, if you are here to troll instead of acting properly then just don’t talk. kthx[/quote]

If you think i’m ‘trolling’ then you have no fucking idea what that even means. Don’t post stupid shit and then tell me to act proper you moron

Read full topic
